entry.title: Process messages in Controlled Manner in Cloud Integration
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Third party system sending messages to CPI   like 10K and we are able to process it but receiver system another third party has rate restriction at their end., means they will allow only 500 messages per hour

we tried many options like Data store but client is interested using JMS 

problem is when the messages are sent to JMS receiver and fetched from JMS queue sender, their is no option to process them in controlled manner

can you suggest any approach ?

entry.title: How to connect to a On-Premise SFTP server from SAP CI via Groovy through Cloud Connector - CF env
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have a requirement where I need to connect to a on-prem SFTP server / servers and share the list of file names , directories , subdirectories names everyday with a third party application. 

I do not want to read the file content in read only mode nd then construct my own directory tree as that would mean bandwidth consumption.

I want to connect to the SFTP server - on prem through cloud connector at this stage from a groovy script in SAP CI using basic auth / cert auth. 

Would be really helpful if anyone has connected to a on prem sftp server from groovy in SAP CI. Can you please hare some insights / code for this requirement?  

Regards

Vinay

entry.title: How to schedule integrations after SuccessFactors Employee central data centers move to UTC time zon
entry.content:
Hello Experts, 

Considering the fact that all SuccessFactors data centers have moved to the UTC time zone, how can one schedule Cloud platform integrations to correctly pick up records that have become effective on a certain day?

Details - Let's assume my SF EC data center is in Tokyo. And let's also assume that I run my HRIS synch at 1 AM UTC, which is 10 AM JST. The future dated Job information records will become current dated only after the HRIS sync (I could be wrong here). So, in this case, only if I run the integration after 1:15 UTC (10:15 AM JST) will the integration pick up all the records that have become effective on that day. If I run the integration at around 4 AM, the UTC time is still 7 PM the previous day and it won't pick up the records that have become effective on the current day. 

Is there a solution to this? How can I manage to pick up all the records that have become effective on a certain day (along with changes since the last time the integration ran), when I run the integration early in the morning, when it's still the previous day in UTC time zone?

I am currently using Compound Employee SOAP call with last modified on and fromDate/toDate filters. 

Thanks

Kriba

entry.title: Configure Post Odata Sender - Error 403
entry.content:
I need to create an Odata to update the data. I'm configuring the sender Odata adapter with Authorization = 'User Role' and Operation = 'Post'. I have deployed it, and when I try to invoke it and  I get a 403 errors.

I have invoked with Postman. I added a body and the following to the headers:

"Content-Type: application/json

Accept: application/json"

I created another GET and it works. Therefore, the problem is not the user I use to invoke it

com_ABCKLAN.A77.tar.gz

Please advise on how the filename field value can be defined at the SFTP adapter level so that it meets the requirement.

Thank you,

Aditya

entry.title: Groovy scrit error when canonicalize XML subtree
entry.content:
Introduction:

I'm now using the groovy in SAP integration suite(CPI) to do the XML signature, but when it comes to the canonicalizeSubtree() step, I got an element type unacceptable error which detail described as below.

Additionally, I had implement the same Java logic in my computer, with no accident, it can run sucessfully.

Error message:

This is the error message I got in CPI runtime:

java.lang.NoSuchMethodException: No signature of method: org.apache.xml.security.c14n.Canonicalizer.canonicalizeSubtree() is applicable for argument types: (com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.dom.DeferredElementNSImpl)

Any tips or advise are fully appreciated

SAP Integration Suite Cloud Integration

entry.title: SAP CI - "Webhook Url is not updated" // org.apache.camel.component.ahc.AhcOperationFailedException
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

An iFlow is supposed to forward an update to a webhook url in Teams after processing.

However, this iFlow terminates. As an error in the Monitor-Overview of the iFlow I get the following message:

"org.apache.camel.component.ahc.AhcOperationFailedException: HTTP operation failed invoking https://<customer>webhookb2/<id>/IncomingWebhook/<id> with statusCode: 403"

In the Message Proccesing Log Attachments I get the error message:

"Webhook Url is not updated"

The last time this worked was on June 31. The behavior is only in the test environment. For Test and Productive environment we we are useing the same Teams/Chanell Web Hook URL. For the productive environment the iFlow still works. Has there been an update from SAP or is the error a different one?

Best regards and thans in advance

entry.title: Integration Suite - Client Certificate usage search
entry.content:
Hi, fellow Integration Suite(Old CPI warriors) developers,

Tried my best to find a standard tool/feature that helps me to find every utilization for a specific Client Certificate entry from Keystore, but had no success so far.

For the time being, I need to navigate through all Iflows to check for Adapters which refers to that specific Client Certificate, which is not a really clever/fast way to perform a search.

Thanks!

entry.title: Integration Suite and Connection Type G for synchronous BAPIs?
entry.content:
I have an ALE scenario where BAPIs are called both synchronously (reading data) and asynchronously (posting). I would like to use the Integration Suite (CPI) to establish a connection between the two systems. The iFlows would be a simple passthrough. This is possible for the asynchronous case where IDocs are simply forwarded. Is this also possible for synchronous BAPIs? How would an iFlow look like?

I've tried calling a synchronous BAPI with a destination of Type G in SE37 but SE37 does not support Type G Connections. Is Type G supported for synchronous BAPIs in general?

entry.title: How to find the segment i need to map in IDOC if I have the specific field name?
entry.content: For Example.  If I know that I need to map Estimated Arrival Date then what are the next steps to find out which segment in IDOC it needs to be mapped?

entry.title: Master Data Integration - Cloud Foundry Runtime / Spaces - yes or no
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm receiving mixed signals here:

  • In SAP Master Data Integration, the "vanilla" documentation says, to create applications / service instances per app without a space and using runtime "other"
  • A scenario specific help, e.g. for Digital Manufacturing however states to use a space
  • I saw that Business Process Orchestrations needs spaces

Do you / shall I use spaces? If I later need to onboard BPO, can I still do this even if I deployed the instances without space at first?

Thanks and cheers

Jens

entry.title: SAP Digital Manufacturing – Inspection Characteristics Not Posted Due to Empty XSLT Configuration
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

we are currently working with SAP Digital Manufacturing (SAP DM) integrated with SAP S/4HANA 2023 SP03. While configuring the Order POD to report inspection characteristics using the "Quality Inspection Result" plugin, we’ve encountered an unexpected issue that I’d like to share with the community for feedback and support.

The Problem

We followed the official documentation for the plugin: Quality Inspection Results | SAP Help Portal

Despite having all relevant configurations in place, inspection characteristics are not being posted back to the system.

What We’ve Checked

We reviewed the integration guide: Inspection Characteristics Integration (Process Order and Production Order) | SAP Help Portal

Here’s what we’ve verified:

  • All QM settings in S/4HANA are correctly configured.
  • All CPI artifacts are deployed and up to date:
    • API_INSPECTIONCATALOG_SRV
    • API_INSPECTIONLOT_SRV
    • API_CHARCATTRIBUTECATALOG_SRV
  • The collaboration link COLLABORATION_SYNC_INSP_RESULT is using the correct directive: ERP_SYNC_INSP_RESULT_V2.

However, in the Integration Workflow "Inspection Results Recording", we noticed that:
No XSLT transformation is configured – all fields are empty.

Comparative Analysis

We compared this to another system (same software version) where the plugin works correctly. The only difference:
 

SystemRuntime Setup OnXSLT Config in Workflow
Working System13 Dec 2024Standard XSLT present
TDD System (Issue)20 Sep 2023XSLT fields empty
 
Working system with filled XSLT configuration.

 
TDD system with empty XSLT configuration.

As a workaround, we manually inserted the standard XSLT from the working system into the Custom-XSLT field of the faulty system – and it worked! Inspection characteristics were successfully posted.

Open Questions

  • Is this a known issue in SAP DM/CPI deployment and should i open an incident?
  • Is there a recommended way to ensure the XSLT configuration is correctly deployed during system setup?
  • Is there a standard deployment step that might have been skipped on the TDD system?

Any insights from the SAP team (@ManoelCosta, @Kevin_Hunter1) or fellow developers would be greatly appreciated. 🙏

Best regards,
Dominik

entry.content:

For example I mam trying to create a tile on SF Home page which will display total number of active employees in EC, How can this be done using BTP.

 

Please guide me.

entry.title: CPI Perform Patch and Post in oData Batch
entry.content:
Hi

I want to use SAP CPI to POST and PATCH text blocks on a delivery in batch mode 

These links seem to imply that it is possible Patch   Post

The post process seems to work using the following payload for the oData v2 connector

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<batchParts>
<batchChangeSet>
<batchChangeSetPart>
<method>POST</method>
<A_OutbDeliveryHeaderText>
<A_OutbDeliveryHeaderTextType>
<DeliveryDocument>83784033</DeliveryDocument>
<TextElement>Z001</TextElement>
<Language>EN</Language>
<TextElementText>Za001 License Plate</TextElementText>
</A_OutbDeliveryHeaderTextType>
</A_OutbDeliveryHeaderText>
</batchChangeSetPart>
<batchChangeSetPart>
<method>POST</method>
<A_OutbDeliveryHeaderText>
<A_OutbDeliveryHeaderTextType>
<DeliveryDocument>83784033</DeliveryDocument>
<TextElement>Z002</TextElement>
<Language>EN</Language>
<TextElementText>Za002 Trailer Number</TextElementText>
</A_OutbDeliveryHeaderTextType>
</A_OutbDeliveryHeaderText>
</batchChangeSetPart>
</batchChangeSet>
</batchParts>
 
However when I replace the POST with PATCH I get an exception error from the odata 
 
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<error xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2007/08/dataservices/metadata">
<code>0050569259751EE4BA9710043F8A5115</code>
<message xml:lang="en">In the context of Data Services an unknown internal server error occurred</message>
<innererror>
<transactionid>eb453173445c4d93b59a3bd9a5dd2640</transactionid>
<timestamp>20250813101554.5083050</timestamp>
<Error_Resolution>
<SAP_Transaction>For backend administrators: use ADT feed reader "SAP Gateway Error Log" or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details</SAP_Transaction>
<SAP_Note>See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis (https://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/1797736)</SAP_Note>
</Error_Resolution>
</innererror>
</error>
The odata is configured as shown below

Please can you give some guidance as to where I am going wrong

 

Thanks

entry.title: The Data Service Request is required to be conditional. Try using the "If-Match" headernull
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am trying to update a Custom Field of a Billing Document (aka customer invoice) on Public Cloud from SAP Integration Suite.

SAP provides 2 different APIs for Billing Documents:
ODATA V2: https://api.sap.com/api/API_BILLING_DOCUMENT_SRV/overview
ODATA V4: https://api.sap.com/api/sap-s4-CE_BILLINGDOCUMENT_0001-v1/overview

Unlike for Sales Orders, where the V2 can be used for PATCH calls, for Billing Documents, only the ODATA V4 has the option to PATCH the object.
However, when I try using the ODATA V4 adaptor in Integration Suite, it gives the following error:
"The Data Service Request is required to be conditional. Try using the "If-Match" headernull [HTTP/1.1 428 Precondition Required]."

My steps are: 

Request Reply: ODATA V4 - a simple GET call to retrieve the E-tag in the header for the given Billing Docuement
Content Modifier: Create Body and Add "If-Match" on the Header from the E-tag
Request Reply: ODATA V4 - PATCH to update a custom field

But the PATCH call fails:

I have also tried to set the "If-Match" to *, but I get the same error.

The same steps for the Sales Order ODATA V2 is working, but I the Billing Document ODATA V4 gives me the above error.

Am I missing something, or am I doing something wrong?
Or is the ODATA V4 adaptor broken?

Any tips would be appreciated.

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Employee Replication from S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition to Sales Cloud Version 2
entry.content:
Dear Community,

how to replicate Employees from S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition to Sales Cloud V2?

We are using the SAP managed integration between S4 and Sales Cloud of SAP Grow Premium for other replications like BusinessPartner and Product etc... 

For on-prem S4 there is an dedicated Employee replication integration flow, but in the S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition integration content there is no such flow.

 

Thanks in advance and kind regards,

Niklas

entry.title: SAP B2B TPM routing of EDIFACT application reference
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have an issue with TPM agreement. We are not able to create 2 flows with same message type in EDIFACT on the same Partner Agreement. We have requirement of different mapping flows depending on Application Reference in UNB segment eg PICK or PACK like below:

UNA:+.? '
UNB+UNOC:3+5031234567890:14+5791234567890:14+250815:1200+11224455++PICK'
UNH+00000000000000+DESADV:D:96A:UN'

and 

UNA:+.? '
UNB+UNOC:3+5031234567890:14+5791234567890:14+250815:1200+11224455++PACK'
UNH+00000000000000+DESADV:D:96A:UN'

Any good ideas?

Regards Brian

#Trading Partner Management
